summary: Senior .NET Developer with over 10 years of experience in building scalable web applications and cloud solutions. Expertise in .NET Core, C#, and SQL with proven leadership in managing development teams and delivering microservices architecture.

responsibilities: Developed microservices using .NET Core, Docker, and Kubernetes, enabling the application to scale for 1M+ users.
Led a team of 5 developers, overseeing code reviews, pair programming, and implementing best practices in CI/CD.
Implemented cloud-based solutions in Azure, including SQL databases and serverless infrastructure.
Built RESTful APIs using ASP.NET Core, improving system performance by 30%.
Worked on database optimization and query tuning in SQL Server.
Collaborated with frontend teams to integrate APIs with Angular-based applications.

projects.title: Fleet Management System
projects.description: A web-based system for managing vehicle fleets, using microservices architecture integrated with GPS systems and SQL Server.
projects.outcome: Reduced order processing time by 40%, improving customer satisfaction.

education.degree: Master of Science in Computer Science
